characters.name: cat
characters.description: A small, sleek feline with soft fur, pointy ears, a long tail, and sharp eyes. Its fur is striped with shades of gray and white.

characters.name: dog
characters.description: A medium-sized, fluffy canine with floppy ears, a bushy tail, and expressive eyes. It has a mix of brown and black fur with white patches.

scenes.background_description: A vibrant park scene in the late afternoon with lush green grass and a clear blue sky. The area is surrounded by tall, leafy trees that provide scattered shade. A well-worn path runs through the park, dotted with daisies and clovers. A gentle breeze causes the leaves to rustle, and a few clouds are visible in the sky.
scenes.narration_text: There is a cat. A dog shows up. The cat chases the dog to the right. The cat catches the dog. The dog cries. The cat jumps with joy and runs away.
